pkgmetadata.longdescription: "A practical guide to ecological modelling - using R as a simulation platform" // Figures, data sets and examples from the book "A practical guide to ecological modelling - using R as a simulation platform" by Karline Soetaert and Peter MJ Herman (2009). Springer. All figures from chapter x can be generated by "demo(chapx)", where x = 1 to 11. The R-scripts of the model examples discussed in the book are in subdirectory "examples", ordered per chapter. Solutions to model projects are in the same subdirectories.
